Recently I swapped out my router and lost my settings, and I forgot how to set the camera back up.  A quick email to Sharx, and they replied same day and even followed up with a phone call to see if I had resolved the issue.  Their customer service is absolutely top notch, and that's the reason I'll continue to buy their products, even at the relatively much higher price than other cameras on the market.  Well built products and great customer service, that's a win-win.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: tach123
Reviews.Content: Great product with all the features that I wanted at a decent price. I had no problems with the setup. I even had to go through two routers on the wireless to get to the internet. I am kind of a techie type but I had it working, sending alarm alerts to my email and being able to view on my Blackberry in just a short time. The Sharx website has no support information but they respond very quickly to inquiries and seem willing to do anything to help you get up and running. They even upgraded my firmware remotely to give me functionality that didn't exist when I purchased my camera. I wouldn't recommend the IR version unless you intend to use it indoors as the IR lamps are too weak to illuminate more than 8 feet or so. I've seen complaints that people can't get audio on MAC's but if you use Quicktime instead of a web browser, you'll hear the audio just fine. I agree that the manual isn't organized very well, but all the information that I needed was there; Except for more details on which kind of SD card works with the unit. They should put a soft copy of the user manual (with updates) on their website for download.I like my camera and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!  LOVE IT!  LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Michelle J. Chalmers
Reviews.Content: I have been a customer of Amazon FOREVER, and I use it often.  But of the hundred of products I have purchased over the years, this is my hands down favorite.  I just love it!  It is incredibly easy to use, the features are numerous and the resolution is crystal clear.  I love that I can log on from anywhere in the world and watch my horses at play.  It is a real treat.  Even my Mom - who lives overseas - can log on and see her colt who stays in my pasture.  She does so several times a day, and shows off her pride & joy to all her friends.  She is so happy I got this!  Me too!  In fact, several of my friends have been so impressed with the camera's quality they are putting the Sharx VIPcella on their birthday and Christmas lists.  Everyone who sees it loves it!

Reviews.Title: Good luck setting it up
Reviews.Author: Born to Shop
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last year and had to spend an hour and a half on the phone with customer support in order to get the thing set up. At the time they blamed the router I was using...apparently that particular darned router causes lots of problems. Fast forward a few months. I'm setting the camera up in a new house with a completely different kind of router. Wouldn't you know, it's impossible again...and once again customer support blames the router.There's no way to call customer support. You have to email them and wait for them to email you back. Then, after several dozen emails, where it's clear they're not paying attention to what you've told them (they keep suggesting this or that may be the problem although you've explained ad nauseum that this or that is NOT the problem) they'll offer to set up a telephone appointment. Then you have to sit and wait for them to call you. They're nice and helpful during the long, long telephone call that finally gets the thing working, but really, do you want to spend this much time setting something up?

Reviews.Title: A+ Camera & Support
Reviews.Author: D. Kim
Reviews.Content: I tried a Foscam camera without any luck...ohhh the frustration! Sharx cameras can take some time to set up but the customer support is top notch. The manual could be slightly improved/updated and the website should have a FAQ to help with the set-up, but I can't stress enough how excellent the support is. Believe me they will get your cameras up and working. I got this camera for indoors and the SCNC3605N for outdoor use. The SCNC2700W adds IR for night vision which is a nice feature to have.

Reviews.Title: Configure and forget
Reviews.Author: Leonard Bottleman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this web cam to replace an old Axis web cam and was delighted with how easy the configuration was and how well the camera works.

Reviews.Title: Sharx or Pet Camera?
Reviews.Author: Enchanted Tiki Room
Reviews.Content: This Sharx camera is virtually identical to the Panasonic Wireless Network Camera and Pet Cam (BL-C20A). The Panasonic camera is less expensive and Panasonic offers free web hosting.I've had a lot of trouble with this camera and the poor wireless range. I find that I cannot install it with a wall between the router and the camera. The camera connects sporadically. Even sitting on a table just 10' from the router, the camera will run for a while, then it will just lose the connection and then come back after 15 minutes or so. Laptops have no problem maintaining the connection with one or more walls between them and the same router.The image quality is fairly good and it should be easy for someone technically adroit to install the device.I couldn't get motion detection alarms to work. When I click on the option to set the motion detection area, the screen is blank and devoid of controls. I've tried it in IE and FireFox. Nothing. I couldn't find any firmware updates on Sharx's website. In fact there really isn't much there of help.Panasonic markets the twin as a pet camera. That's probably a good use for the Sharx as well. Not recommended for a location where you can't physically pull the plug and restart it.

Reviews.Title: Good camera and easy setup
Reviews.Author: great_lakes
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera and had it working within hour, great camera for the money. The manual was written for someone at least with some knowledge with networking background, otherwise you will have to spend hours with customer support.

Reviews.Title: For me, the Sharx SCNC2606 is the best Network Camera ever!
Reviews.Author: R. Braveheart "Landscape Photographer"
Reviews.Content: Having worked with numerous network cameras from many leading manufacturers (D-link, Linksys, etc), the Sharx SCNC2606 was absolutely the fastest and easiest camera I've ever installed. The entire device was unpacked, setup, plugged in to our router, and operating in under 15 minutes. And with just a few minutes more work, it was sending beautiful images via WiFi.Equally as important, image quality (both streaming and still) is top-notch and better than I've experienced with any camera before. This camera also adjusts quickly to changing light levels when viewing outdoor subjects. And for night time or low light conditions, the "moonlight mode" works amazingly well by increasing its light sensitivity.Besides streaming video, I use this camera to upload images at timed intervals to an ftp server for viewing them on a website, and that option works great. In addition, although I have not used them yet, the camera includes motion detection sensors (for security applications) and an option to access your camera's video using certain cell phones.Overall, this is a great camera to consider as a security, pet or child camera, for business monitoring applications, or simply for watching your outdoors from the comfort of your easy chair.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product - will buy more
Reviews.Author: jalmquist
Reviews.Content: After trying some other products, like Panasonic's "pet cam", this one far exceeds in quality, optional configuration and performance.  I am very happy with it.  I run through Forefront TMG, so anyone looking for advice on publishing the website can contact me.

Reviews.Title: poor wireless range
Reviews.Author: Majid Karimi
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera.  It has a very poor wireless range.  I have several other wireless devices (IP cameras, Laptop, PDA) and they all work fine.  This camera is located 15' from my router without any walls in between and it connects sporadically and just loses its connection for no reason.  My other wireless devices are located in other rooms and they all work fine.  I contacted them to get a RMA number and after five days I got an email saying that they will send me a shipping box to return my unit, however that was four weeks ago and I have not received anything from them and they do not even answer my emails any more.  You will be wasting your money buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Not able to use it
Reviews.Author: Aditi Jain "Aditi"
Reviews.Content: I am not able to use the camera since i could not get it setup right. I called amazon, they call the seller, but that number NOT EXISTED. is it some fake seller with fake reviews? anyways if i do not get in touch with the seller in couple of day - i will retrun the camera.

Reviews.Title: total wast of money
Reviews.Author: Lawrence T. Grice
Reviews.Content: At first it would work briefly.  But it's IP address would change periodically.  Now it just doesn't work.  I suspect it might be faulty hardware.  It would have been awsome if it would have worked as described.

Reviews.Title: Didn't get it set up
Reviews.Author: R. Martin "veggie mama"
Reviews.Content: Looks and sounds great but couldn't get it set up on my own.  Frustrating.
